EmailTemplate.name: 202005_Amer_BGA_Central_Operators-Mechanics-Avionics_Webinar.Confirmation - Cent
EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] Virtual Honeywell Operator Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for registering for Virtual Honeywell Operator Conference - Central Region
To join the event, please log on to the webinar platform by clicking here <[[https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/2322906/870D202CF9BE427E18CA664F1A367E6D]]>, fifteen minutes before the event starts.
Date: May 13, 2020 Time: 10:00 a.m. CT {{my.Add to Calendar}}
We look forward to meeting you online for this webinar.
Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
